amendment.description: On page 2, line 15, insert after the dollar amount "(increased by $11,055,300)". ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for the Bureau of Land Management, National Park Service, and Forest Service. And, decrease funds for the National Endowment for the Arts by $31,588,000.

action.text: Mr. Dicks raised a point of order against the Bishop (UT) amendment (A001). The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Bishop (UT).
